text: I've asked before about this, but is there an issue for `Fetching: [========================================>]  100.0 %` being stuck for a while on julia 1.6.0-rc1 on linux? I have no numbers, but it feels slow, and it unfortunately offsets the time gained by parallel precompilation:hourglass_flowing_sand:

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
delete and re-add general. I had this for a while and that fixed it.
